bonanza.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a lucky or successful situation where people can make a lot of money
bonanza.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: 2008 was a bonanza year for the oil industry.
bonanza.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a US television show first made in the 1960s, which continued for many years. It is about a family who live in the Wild West on a ranch (=large farm) called the ‘Ponderosa’. The music that is played at the beginning is famous.
bonanza.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a lucky or successful situation in which a person or business makes a lot of money
bonanza.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: a £5 million export sales bonanza in the United States
a bonanza year for the computer industry
